title: Having Really Bad Luck With Key Fragments
body:
Hi!
I remember when the Hextech Crafting was announced, Riot said that you should be able to get enough key fragments to open all four chests every month.
I play LoL a lot. I play it daily, multiple games a day. But I can't seem to get anywhere near that goal.
I got every single chest since it came out, never missing one. Right now I have seven unlocked chests.
Every month there is a reset, so I can actually get keys, and I can open roughly two boxes (3 if I'm lucky). But afterwards it's almost impossible (for me anyway) to get keys.
I usually play premade with my friends, very frequently we are 5, but I just can't seem to get enough keys per month.
As I said, I have seven chests right now and I should get another one or two until the next reset.
I know I'm renting about something that is free, but I remember Riot saying you should be able to get enough keys to open all chests every month.
I don't know if I'm just unlucky, but I just have way too many chests and not enough keys.

replies.body:
Key fragments are not guaranteed, but their chances of dropping are a lot higher at the start and continue to decrease the more you receive it.  This curve resets roughly every 28 days though, so your increased chances restore per our [hextech crafting](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/207884233-Hextech-Crafting-Guide).  

You've received 10 keys since the 21st of last month, so it will likely reset soon and you will start seeing an increased drop again.  I don't recall us ever guaranteeing that you will get enough fragments to open all four chests; however, it is absolutely doable- you'll just need to play more games if you've already had a high drop rate during that period.  Good luck!
